content.description: Assume that an array of integer values has been declared as follows and has been initialized.
content.question: int[] arr = new int[10]; Which of the following code segments correctly interchanges the value of arr[0] and arr[5] ?

choices.label: int k = arr[5]; arr[0] = arr[5]; arr[5] = k;
int k = arr[0]; arr[0] = arr[5]; arr[5] = k;

content.answer: int k = arr[0]; arr[0] = arr[5]; arr[5] = k;

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
